personality_traits: I idolize a particular hero of my faith.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies.
I see omens in every event and action.
Acolyte.ideals: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
Acolyte.bonds: I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died.
Acolyte.flaws: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.

personality_traits: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation.
I am incredibly slow to trust.
Criminal.ideals: Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade.
Criminal.bonds: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made.
Criminal.flaws: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.

personality_traits: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what.
Folk Hero.ideals: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)
Folk Hero.bonds: I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
Folk Hero.flaws: I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings.

personality_traits: My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel like the most wonderful and important person in the world.
No one could doubt by looking at my regal bearing that I am a cut above the unwashed masses.
I take great pains to always look my best and follow the latest fashions.
Noble.ideals: Responsibility. It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me.
Noble.bonds: I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family.
Noble.flaws: I secretly believe that everyone is beneath me.

personality_traits: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition.
I've read every book in the world's greatest libraries—or I like to boast that I have.
I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am.
Sage.ideals: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)
Sage.bonds: It is my duty to protect my students.
Sage.flaws: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.

personality_traits: I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
I enjoy being strong and like breaking things.
I am haunted by memories of war.
Soldier.ideals: Greater Good. It is each person's responsibility to make the world a better place.
Soldier.bonds: Those who fight beside me are those worth dying for.
Soldier.flaws: I made a terrible mistake in battle that cost many lives.

personality_traits: I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies.
I love a good insult, even one directed at me.
Entertainer.ideals: Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)
Entertainer.bonds: Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I'll get it back.
Entertainer.flaws: I'll do anything to win fame and renown.

personality_traits: I've been isolated for so long that I rarely speak.
I am utterly serene, even in the face of disaster.
I feel tremendous empathy for all who suffer.
Hermit.ideals: Self-Knowledge. If you know yourself, there's nothing left to know. (Any)
Hermit.bonds: Nothing is more important than the other members of my hermitage.
Hermit.flaws: I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts that my isolation failed to quell.

personality_traits: I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right.
I idolize a hero of my guild who taught me everything I know.
I’m horribly jealous of anyone who can outshine my handiwork.
Guild Artisan.ideals: Community. It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community.
Guild Artisan.bonds: I owe my guild a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.
Guild Artisan.flaws: I can't keep a secret to save my life, or anyone else's.

personality_traits: I am driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home.
I watch over my friends as if they were a family.
I feel far more comfortable around animals than people.
Outlander.ideals: Freedom. The sea, the mountains, and the sky are free for the taking.
Outlander.bonds: I will bring terrible wrath down on the evildoers who destroyed my homeland.
Outlander.flaws: I am slow to trust members of other races, tribes, and societies.

personality_traits: I have a strong sense of justice.
I love exploring new places.
I enjoy telling stories.
background_info_default.ideals: Freedom. The open road is calling to me. (Chaotic)
background_info_default.bonds: I will do anything to protect the people I care about.
background_info_default.flaws: I am quick to anger and easily provoked.

backstories.Acolyte: Raised in a secluded monastery, I dedicated my life to serving my deity.
backstories.Criminal: I grew up on the streets, learning to survive by any means necessary.
backstories.Folk Hero: I stood up against a tyrant in my village and became a local legend.
backstories.Noble: Born into a wealthy family, I was groomed for leadership and diplomacy.
backstories.Sage: I spent years studying ancient texts and uncovering forgotten knowledge.
backstories.Soldier: I served in the king's army, fighting bravely in numerous battles.
backstories.Entertainer: I traveled from town to town, performing and captivating audiences.
backstories.Hermit: I withdrew from society to seek spiritual enlightenment.
backstories.Guild Artisan: I honed my craft in the city, contributing to my guild's prosperity.
backstories.Outlander: I wandered the wilderness, forging a life away from civilization.

roles_in_world: Bard who tells tales of heroism
Spy gathering information for a faction

Zynthar.title: the Eternal Flame
Zynthar.description: Zynthar embodies the perfect balance of order and chaos, the endless cycle of creation and destruction.

Vraktar.title: the Ember of Order
Vraktar.description: Vraktar seeks to impose structure and stability, creating the immutable laws that govern the cosmos.

Khaloth.title: the Spark of Chaos
Khaloth.description: Khaloth revels in the unpredictable and the ever-changing, introducing flux and transformation wherever it goes.

Sardior.title: the Balanced Blaze
Sardior.description: Sardior seeks to maintain the equilibrium that Zynthar once represented, striving for balance between order and chaos.

Torm.title: the Loyal Fury
Torm.description: Torm is the deity of courage and self-sacrifice.

Lolth.title: the Queen of Spiders
Lolth.description: Lolth is the deity of deceit and ambition, often worshiped by drow.

Bahamut.title: the Platinum Dragon
Bahamut.description: Bahamut is the deity of justice and nobility, revered by paladins and righteous warriors.

Mystra.title: the Lady of Mysteries
Mystra.description: Mystra governs the Weave of magic, guiding mages and sorcerers.

Selûne.title: the Moonmaiden
Selûne.description: Selûne is the goddess of the moon and navigation, offering protection to travelers.

Moradin.title: the All-Hammer
Moradin.description: Moradin is the chief deity of dwarves, embodying creation and craftsmanship.

Kord.title: the Stormlord
Kord.description: Kord is the god of strength and storms, inspiring warriors and athletes.

Tempus.title: the Lord of Battles
Tempus.description: Tempus is the deity of war and heroism, revered by soldiers and tacticians.

Sune.title: the Lady of Love
Sune.description: Sune is the goddess of love and beauty, inspiring artists and lovers.

factions.name: The Circle of the Endless Journey
factions.philosophy: Represents the chaotic counter-culture within Tabaxi society
factions.goals: To disrupt the status quo and promote freedom, innovation, and personal growth through chaos and change
factions.notable_characteristics: Interprets stars in unique ways, challenges rigid societal structures

factions.name: The Blade Guard
factions.philosophy: Elite military order sworn to protect the Emperor and uphold the values of the Tabaxus Imperium
factions.goals: Protect the Emperor, uphold imperial values, train the next generation of Blade Guards
factions.notable_characteristics: Known for exceptional swordsmanship and unwavering loyalty

factions.name: The Syndicate
factions.philosophy: Powerful faction of traders, artisans, and entrepreneurs from various races
factions.goals: Dominate the commercial landscape, use wealth to influence political decisions, expand trade networks
factions.notable_characteristics: Controls much of the commerce within the Tabaxus Imperium

factions.name: The Sylvan Glade
factions.philosophy: Faction of Elven druids deeply connected to nature
factions.goals: Protect wilderness, communicate with land spirits, maintain natural balance
factions.notable_characteristics: Acts as voice of the wild and guardians of nature

factions.name: The Verdant Vanguard
factions.philosophy: Group of Elves dedicated to rediscovering and preserving lost knowledge of their ancestors
factions.goals: Locate ancient Elven ruins, recover lost artifacts and texts, preserve rediscovered knowledge
factions.notable_characteristics: Searches for ways to reconnect with their arcane heritage

factions.name: The Celestial Court
factions.philosophy: Faction of Tabaxi priests, astrologers, and seers who interpret celestial movements
factions.goals: Provide guidance to the Tabaxus Imperium based on celestial signs, expand their influence
factions.notable_characteristics: Deeply respected by Tabaxi, wields significant influence in the empire

factions.name: The Order of the Whispering Paws
factions.philosophy: Embodies principles of law, order, and destiny within Tabaxi culture
factions.goals: Uphold and enforce laws of Ellium, ensure peace and stability through adherence to cosmic order
factions.notable_characteristics: Strong ties to governmental bodies, acts as advisors, judges, and enforcers

factions.name: The Crimson Compass
factions.philosophy: Group of Human adventurers, explorers, and treasure hunters supporting each other
factions.goals: Provide support for Human adventurers, take on lucrative jobs, explore ruins and uncover treasures

factions.name: The Blazing Scales
factions.philosophy: Secretive faction of scholars who have uncovered fragments of truth about the gods
factions.goals: Maintain balance between order and chaos, gather knowledge about the true nature of the gods
factions.notable_characteristics: Works behind the scenes to prevent imbalance in cosmic forces

factions.name: The Adamantine Assembly
factions.philosophy: Secretive organization of Dwarves practicing shadow magic and psionic abilities
factions.goals: Protect Dwarven interests, gather intelligence, manipulate events from the shadows
factions.notable_characteristics: Operates in secrecy, uses combination of shadow magic and psionics

factions.name: The Whispering Quill Society
factions.philosophy: Network of individuals with innate magical abilities or rediscovered arcane knowledge
factions.goals: Provide safe haven for magic users, protect members from persecution, advance understanding of magic
factions.notable_characteristics: Operates in secret, supports and protects magic users in a world that fears their abilities
